channel.title: Duping
channel.description:
Hey guys I am the owner of runemyth which is a 317 and there is a dupe going around that involves the general store and I'm not sure on how to do it so i cannot fix it :( so i was wondering if anyone knew how to do it or how to fix it! If anyone would be willing to help me that would be great, email me at jtgrieg@sbcglobal.net
Thanks, Dennis

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @division1 division1
item.description:
@division1 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:4, topic:397821”][quote author=division1 link=topic=494952.msg3618695#msg3618695 date=1307209227]

Post your server type please, can’t tell much from the name.
[/quote]i did, its a 317 sorry about that… Any ideas?

Try making your general store only when you sell items to it they don’t go into the shops stock.[/quote]hmm… ill try that but do you have any ideas on how to do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Go in as a hidden admin and ask someone how to do it for like, a million GP or something
Once you know how to do it, it would be alot easyer for you to fix

Read full topic
